summary: A comic caper about Happy Singh, a Punjabi villager who goes through a series of misadventures and eventually becomes the Kinng of the Australian underworld.
cast: Akshay Kumar|Katrina Kaif|Om Puri|Kirron Kher|Ranvir Shorey|Javed Jaffrey|Neha Dhupia|Yashpal Sharma|Manoj Pahwa|Kamal Chopra|Sudhanshu Pandey|Sonu Sood|Vivica Mitra|Gurpreet Ghuggi|Satwant Kaur|Khayali Saharan|Chander Kalra|Amritpal Billa|Amritpal Chhotu|Hari Om Jalota|Gurcharan Dardi|Sanchita Choudhary|Shailza Thakur|Rakesh Dogra|Dimple Bagroy|Lachman Bhojwani|Ingrid Breitfelder|Scott Brewer|Joel Amos Byrnes|Mukesh Gidderbaha|Dale Gill|Alain Grootaers|Daniel Lazdinis|Avelino 'El Rico' Lescot|Del Mak|Brad McMurray|Chayan Sarkar|Aashin A. Shah|Snoop Dogg|Steven Spiel|Alisi Styles|Vernon Willemse|Preity Üpala|Sacha Bodell|Paul Geoghegan|Tara Jade Ross|Arne Rutjes
title: Singh Is Kinng
